page.title: 08FARMING - FARM VEHICLES
page.content: Being an area that is extremely difficult to reach, the most useful vehicles are tractors and Landrovers. The cultivated fields are large and very uneven. Combine harvesters, trailers, balers, ploughs, disc harrows, rakes, riddles, seed spreaders and sprayers are all used in the harvest cycle. On one specialised farm a single track vehicle is used in bad conditions. Diesel fuel is kept in storage tanks on some of the farms as there are no fuel stations in the immediate vicinity. Beef cattle and sheep are transported out of the area by waggons brought in for this purpose.
